attributes.action: Financial help for everyone to they can spend some more money on hygiene product
attributes.additional_details:
There is a few possible ways for that like 

1 . Temporary stop collecting debt and repayment debts and credit cards and loans by lenders or debt collector companies 

2 . Categories job titles by involving with risk of contagion and take less tax and national insurance from them for example a cashier in store dealing face to face with people touching items what they touched and taking money from them and then serving another with same risks or more jobs titles.
attributes.background: Due to Coronavirus novel 2019 ( COVID-19 ) speared in the UK and the price for hygiene products goes higher if people can keep in some more money for a while to they can spend it on the very expensive hygiene products that would be an advantage to keep people more safe and control contagion.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284
